item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

GrimReapersScythe:

To make it a certain level to get certain items, I’m not sure how to do. But for the random number, you would have to add the math.random statement into the receivegem void, or whichever void you mad.

sorry that was a typo, i already got it so that you need a certain crafting level to steal certain gems

item.title: Make an object give more than 1 item when clicked
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

yea i got that but how do i make it so you recieve more gems such as rubies and diamonds.

or better yet, randomly recieving a certain amount of 1 gem each time such as
12 diamonds one time
5 dstones the next
16 sapphires the next
etc. etc…

rite i have it so your crafting lvl corresponds with what gem u get like
under 75-100 crafting u steal 4 d-stones, 70-75 crafting you steal a diamond, etc…

thanks for the feedback so far though

item.source: Make an object give more than 1 item when clicked

item.title: Make an object give more than 1 item when clicked
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

[quote=“Trent!!, post:2, topic:306718”]shouldnt there be a part in your code that says.

add item

and the item codes and amounts are underneath?[/quote]

Not in codes like this. I"ll explain.

} if(objectID == 2562){

This is saying that the gem’s stall id is 2562.

TheifStall("gem stall",

This part is saying the stalls name, which shows up in the thief method, as to "You steal from the +getstallname+ or whatever it is in your server.

"and recieve some uncut gems"
This is the second part of the thief method, saying what you receive from each stall.

 80, 750*playerLevel[17], 1624, 12, 0x340);

The 80 would be stating, the level needed to steal from the stall, the 750 would be the exp received.
The playerLevel is stating its the thieving skill. The 1624 is the gems item id. And the 12 is the amount of gems.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2009, 06:29:00 pm[/size][hr][quote=“syracusepker94, post:1, topic:306718”]heres what i got

} if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve some uncut gems", 80, 750*playerLevel[17], 1624, 12, 0x340);

how can add onto it so it also gives 10 emeralds, 8 rubies, etc. etc…

thanks[/quote]
Also, you would have to make a void for receiving the items.

Read full topic
